content: You Vainly Collect Medicines
’s Messages through the prophet Jeremiah regarding the godless nations.

The Message to Egypt and the army of Pharaoh Neco king of Egypt at the time it was defeated by Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon while camped at Carchemish on the Euphrates River in the fourth year of the reign of Jehoiakim king of Judah:
“‘Present arms!
Harness the horses!
Battle formation! Helmets on,
But what’s this I see?
They break ranks and run for cover.
They run this way and that,
It’s total chaos, total confusion, danger everywhere!”
Egypt’s Army Slithers Like a Snake
The Message that  gave to the prophet Jeremiah when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon was on his way to attack Egypt:
“Tell Egypt, alert Migdol,
‘Wake up! Be prepared!

-of-the-Angel-Armies, the God of Israel, says, “Watch out when I visit doom on the god Amon of Thebes, Egypt and its gods and kings, Pharaoh and those who trust in him. I’ll turn them over to those who are out to kill them, to Nebuchadnezzar and his military. Egypt will be set back a thousand years. Eventually people will live there again.” ’s Decree.* * *
“But you, dear Jacob my servant, you have nothing to fear.
Look up! I’ll save you from that far country,
Things are going to be normal again for Jacob,
Yes, dear Jacob my servant, you have nothing to fear.
I’ll finish off all the godless nations
But I won’t finish you off.
I’ll punish you, but fairly.
